Articles.Content: my life.

I activate the reality bomb.

My void.

I call John Cena.

My void.

I call Lebron James

my void-like basket ball pitch

I hire God to rebuild the universe. Then I hire Ptah to make Kerbalkind on several planets who build KSC 

My KSC, KSCs for everyone!
I offer God a contract to build a planet for me. He accepts, and I name the new planet My Hill. Now, no matter who claims it, this planet will always be My Hill. It also has lots of hills on it.

I tell god all the sins you did. He smites you, and I take over "My Hill". Now, the planet is called "My Hill", except that I'm on it.

So now, it's quite literally "My Hill".

...which I claim in the name of Britain, and hire the BBC to maintain it.

 

It is now "Alfred Hawthorne Hill" <cue Yakkety Sax here!>

I build a hill on Sedna.

My Sedna hill.
I redirect Makemake into Sedna. My molten(?) ball of liquid ice, and from the debris I build a rocket-powered hill which I escape inside of to my other hill on Io.

I look on you with shame knowing that i still have my own hill back home. My hill.

Edited January 24, 2016 by ThaZeus

I reverse time to the very beginning and claim the hill first.

My original hill.
I reverse time to before the big bang and stop it after the universe gets to a few meters big. I then make a hill. My hill.

You resume time, and the expansion and heat of the new universe break you and your hill up into subatomic particles and exotic kinds of plasma.

A few tens of trillions of years later, Gojira is born. One day, he decides to make a "king of the hill" style thread on the forums of a quite-new game called Kerbal Space Program. After a long forum war, a young teenager named Matuchkin tell god all the sins that Cubinator did (comment on 01/18/16 3:18PM), taking the hill. My hill.

Edited January 26, 2016 by Matuchkin

I summon the Kraken, whose constant attacks force God to ragequit.

My theology.

AH! But that's where you fall into my trap!

After I told god about Cubinator's sins in comment# 01/18/16 3:18PM, Xorth Tanovar was supposed to claim it in the name of Britain. Instead, Sanic came up and summoned the kraken. Therefore, a time paradox takes place. No one knows (or can visualize) what happens next, and the universe ceases to exist.

No one's hill.

Game over.

Edited January 27, 2016 by Matuchkin

Move 1: I take a hill.

Edited January 27, 2016 by Matuchkin

Move 2: Due to regulatory and environmental concerns, you decide to move to the shore and sell the hill to me at a loss.

 

My hill!

Edited January 27, 2016 by Xorth Tanovar

Move 3: You fall bankrupt and do not manage to pay your rent. The IRS comes and takes some of your belongings. They also take your hill.

I bribe the IRS, and the hill is given to me. My hill.

Let's make this a peaceful, bureaucratical and political conflict.

I find out that you bribed IRS officials to say I didn't pay the rent, went public with the news, and took you to court.

 

I win the hill back, plus $.02 for mental anguish

The KSSR falls due to economic downfall. You lose your hill. After a decade, I move to Canada and found my hill there for $1.38 million USD.

My Hill and Co Bank Services inc.

Edited January 27, 2016 by Matuchkin

I take the hill via an elaborate conspiracy.

My hill.

Edited January 27, 2016 by mikeman7918

Via twitter and facebook, the conspiracy is revealed. The news calls it a "controversy". In a massive law case, mikeman7918's "Hill and Co Bank Services inc." is run aground and bankrupt. The company is given back to its previous owner, Matuchkin, who gives @Xorth Tanovar 50% of the stock (alliance).

My "Hill and Co Bank Services inc."

I take the hill, but Buy N Large buys me out...

BnL's hill.

Wall-E scraps the hill, making it into a building-shaped pile of refuse in a different location. I meanwhile locate and purchase a new hill with the $$$ gained from stock sales.

 

My hill!
